title: Hedge Funds Turn More Bullish on Oil Amid Venezuela, Iran Unrest
description: Hedge funds hiked bullish wagers on US crude to a five-month high as the initial shock of the US capture of Venezuelan President Nicolás Maduro gave way to fears of stunted oil flows from the Middle East as deadly protests grip Iran.
content: Hedge funds hiked bullish wagers on US crude to a five-month high as the initial shock of the US capture of Venezuelan President Nicolás Maduro gave way to fears of stunted oil flows from the Middle East as deadly protests grip Iran.
